game.name: 纵横麻将 Matrix Mahjong
game.shortDescription: Matrix Mahjong is a single-player game adapted from Mahjong. In each game, players can combine tiles in both horizontal and vertical dimensions. Every move is full of change and possibility in this interwoven space of tiles.
